casebody.data:
MINFORD et al. v. MOORE & McCORMICK CO., Inc. (Circuit Court of Appeals, Second Circuit. May 21, 1923.) No. 280. Burlingham, Yeeder, Masten & Fearey, of New York City (Ray Rood Allen, of New York City, of counsel), for appellants. William Hayward, U. S. Atty., of New York City (Horace T. Atkins and Glen R. Snider, both of New York City, of counsel), for respondent.

Before ROGERS, MANTON, and MAYER,Circuit Judges.

PER CURIAM.

Judgment affirmed.
